item.title: Server problem
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

killdogz:

[quote]And what method are you putting that case in?

He’s code are fine there nothing wrong with them he has to add them object.cfg in config folder

By adding them into the object.cfg it will allow the portals to work

To get to the object.cfg open your server file and there’s a config folder at top open that then there the object.cfg file after you opened that follow this guide

object = 348	3250	3420	1

copy a line of the code and paste it and change the object id and cords here what is what

object = """      ####  $$$$ ?

“”"<-- is object id

###<—x cord

$$$$<—y cord

?<–i have no idea what this is i just leave it as 1[/quote]

No, im sure whenever i had added objects. i have never used object.cfg.

and his code made be right, but if he is adding it to the wrong method. its not going to work.

Read full topic

item.title: Server problem
item.dc:creator: @killdogz killdogz
item.description:
@killdogz wrote:

the codes are fine what u need to do is go into the config folder and open objects then inside you will see

object = 348	3250	3420	1

copy a line of the code and paste it and change the object id and cords here what is what

object = """      ####  $$$$ ?

“”"<-- is object id

###<—x cord

$$$$<—y cord

?<–i have no idea what this is i just leave it as 1

Hope this has helped

item.title: Server problem
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

Well, ive recently switched over from Czar to “Rich Scape V2(which is devolution v7)” and objects arent working.

the origional code used is

if (objectID == 2469) { // Portal teleportToX = 3565; // teleport to top floor X Axis teleportToY = 3309; // teleport to top floor Y axis heightLevel = 0; // top floor teleport itemMessage("Welcome to Barrows Minigame", "", 4718, 250); break; }
which didnt do anything, so i added

case 2469: // barrowsportal teleportToX = 3565; teleportToY = 3309; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("You teleport to the Barrows Area!"); break; }
Still, my portalss dont work. note: its not only the portals

Read full topic
